import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import paw from '../images/paw.webp' function LandingPage() { const [showNavLinks, setShowNavLinks] = useState(true) const auth = localStorage.getItem('auth') || null const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ if(auth) { navigate('home', {replace:true}) } }, [auth]) return (
